description: Candidates express their views on the States tax system and whether it needs changing.
title: Guernsey Election 2020: Future of taxation
title_page: Guernsey Election 2020: Future of taxation - BBC News
maintext: "Since zero-10 was introduced Guernsey's tax structure has been fiddled with at the edges to try to meet the resolution of putting the burden on those most able to pay, but there is still work to be done to achieve this and a wholesale review is required."
